item.description:
There are three races you can sign up for
8 AM
11 AM
2 PM

You can sign up as a team or individually. If we have enough people going we might form a team and go. If we do not, you can still sign up individually and they will match you with other people on the day of the race so you can race in a team. We had an excellent experience at limerock park last time and its lots of fun. Its a good and technical track to expand your "horizons" :)

Besides nothing beats racing inside a real race track with a full fledged race going on the main track around you.

Prices:
$150 per person in a 3-member team. Or you can sign up individually and ask to be matched up. I think its easiest to sign up individually and we can match up later.

Details are here:
Sign up:
https://www.eventvill...

FAQ:
http://www.endurancek...
item.name: 90 minute Endurance Karting at Limerock Park
